scene_description: chef bao bao presents their dish to the judges, a vietnamese pork frost ice cream with a noodle churros and a meringue on top. the judges are impressed with the creativity and presentation of the dish.
chef rj explains his dish, a pasta alla bolognese using the meatballs, spicy chicken seasoning, and peanut brittle. he's keeping things simple and adding a fresh cucumber salad on top.
the host welcomes the chefs to the noodle palooza battle, explaining the rules and ingredients. the chefs are excited and ready to start cooking.
